effect.short: Blocks damaging attacks and damages attacking Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP.
effect.full: Blocks damaging attacks and damages attacking Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP.

flavorTexts.text:
In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this
move also damages any attacker who makes
direct contact.
